s4070: Tenth year: Jin Xi Ke defeated the duke at An, captured Peng Chou Fu.
s4071: Eleventh year: with Lu and Cao defeated Qi.
s4073: Second year, autumn: Shen Gong Wu Chen stole Zheng Shu's mother and fled to Jin, made him minister of Xing. Winter: attacked Wei and Lu, rescued Qi.
s4075: Eleventh year: Mu Gong passed away. With the feudal lords defeated Qi, returned and invaded their territory. Chu attacked us.
s4085: Third year: assembled Jin, Song, Wei, Cao to attack Zheng.
s4086: Eleventh year: Qing Gong went to Jin, wished to enfeoff Jin as king, Jin did not dare accept.
s4087: Twelfth year: began establishing the six ministers. Led the feudal lords to attack Zheng.
s4095: Seventeenth year: Jin led the feudal lords to attack us.
s4101: Fourth year: the duke went to Jin, Jin was disrespectful, the duke wished to violate Jin and ally with Chu.
s4103: Thirteenth year: the Lu duke came, was disrespectful.
s4105: Fourth year: Zi Fan rescued Zheng.
s4111: Eighteenth year: Jin Luan Shu took our Fan. Xiang Gong passed away.
s4116: Twenty-first year: Ding Wang passed away.
s4119: Fourteenth year: Liang Shan collapsed. Bo Zong concealed the person but used his words.
s4121: Fifth year: attacked Zheng because they violated our alliance. Zheng Dao Gong came to accuse.
s4127: Zheng Dao Gong Fei first year: the duke went to Chu to accuse.
s4135: Fifteenth year: sent Luan Shu to rescue Zheng, then invaded Cai.
s4143: Second year: Dao Gong passed away. Chu attacked us, Jin sent Luan Shu to rescue.
s4151: Sixteenth year: with Wu Chen began communicating with Wu and plotted against Chu.
s4159: Zheng Cheng Gong Si first year: younger brother of Dao Gong. Chu attacked us.
s4161: Second year: minister Wu came, plotted to attack Chu.
s4167: Seventeenth year: restored Zhao Wu's fields. Invaded Cai.
s4182: Seventeenth year: Qing Gong passed away.
s4183: Eighteenth year: seized Zheng Cheng Gong, attacked Zheng. Qin attacked us.
s4185: Ninth year: rescued Zheng. Winter: made peace with Jin.
s4191: Third year: allied with Chu. The duke went to Jin, seized the duke and attacked us.
s4197: Tenth year: the duke went to Jin for burial rites, hid it.
s4207: Fourth year: Jin led the feudal lords to attack us.
s4216: Twenty-fourth year: allied with the Jin duke across the river, returned and violated the alliance.
s4245: Thirteenth year: assembled Jin to attack Qin.
s4247: Third year: attacked Qin to Jing, defeated them, captured their general Cheng Chai.
s4248: Twenty-sixth year: Jin led the feudal lords to attack us.
s4250: Eleventh year: Jin led us to attack Qin.
s4254: Seventeenth year: Jin led us to attack Qin.
s4255: Seventh year: Jin led us to attack Qin.
s4267: Twelfth year: Ding Gong passed away.
s4277: Fifteenth year: began communicating with Wu, assembled at Zhong Li.
s4279: Fifth year: the three Xi slandered Bo Zong, killed him; Bo Zong was fond of upright remonstrance.
s4281: Fifteenth year: Xu feared Zheng, requested to move to Ye.
s4282: Thirteenth year: Hua Yuan fled to Jin, returned again.
s4286: Second year: Jin seized our duke and returned.
s4289: Tenth year: assembled with Lu at Zhong Li.
s4293: Sixteenth year: Xuan Bo informed Jin, wished to kill Ji Wen Zi, Wen Zi escaped through righteousness.
s4297: Twentieth year: Xiang Gong passed away.
s4301: Twenty-fourth year: Zhuang Gong passed away.
